item.title: [scd] Kangee's Lieutenant
item.description:
Creature — Bird Soldier

Flying

Whenever Kangee's Lieutenant attacks, attacking creatures with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Encore {5}{W} ({5}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [scd] Kangee, Sky Warden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Bird Wizard

Flying, vigilance

Whenever Kangee, Sky Warden attacks, attacking creatures with flying get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Whenever Kangee blocks, blocking creatures with flying get +0/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Kaervek the Merciless
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Shaman

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Kaervek the Merciless deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target.

item.title: [scd] Jwar Isle Refuge
item.description:
Land

Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.

When Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [scd] Jubilant Skybonder
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flying

Creatures you control with flying have "Spells your opponents cast that target this creature cost {2} more to cast."

item.title: [scd] Josu Vess, Lich Knight
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Knight

Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.)

Menace

When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

item.title: [scd] Jaspera Sentinel
item.description:
Creature — Elf Rogue

Reach

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [scd] Jade Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

{2}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

item.title: [scd] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [scd] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [scd] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [scd] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [scd] Inspired Sphinx
item.description:
Creature — Sphinx

Flying

When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.

{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [scd] Indulgent Tormentor
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

item.title: [scd] Idol of Oblivion
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

item.title: [scd] Hunter's Prowess
item.description:
Sorcery

Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

item.title: [scd] Hunter's Insight
item.description:
Instant

Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

item.title: [scd] Hour of Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Destroy all nontoken creatures.

item.title: [scd] Hornet Queen
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Flying

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

item.title: [scd] Hornet Nest
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [scd] Holdout Settlement
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [scd] Hoard-Smelter Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.

item.title: [scd] Heraldic Banner
item.description:
Artifact

As Heraldic Banner enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [scd] Hedron Archive
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

item.title: [scd] Haven of the Spirit Dragon
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [scd] Havengul Lich
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

{1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast it this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Hate Mirage
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose up to two target creatures you don't control. For each of those creatures, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [scd] Harvest Season
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Harmonize
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards.

item.title: [scd] Harbinger of the Hunt
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{2}{R}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

{2}{G}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each other creature with flying.

item.title: [scd] Hanged Executioner
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

item.title: [scd] Guttersnipe
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [scd] Grimoire of the Dead
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on Grimoire of the Dead.

{T}, Remove three study counters from Grimoire of the Dead and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.

item.title: [scd] Great Oak Guardian
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Reach

When Great Oak Guardian enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.

item.title: [scd] Graypelt Refuge
item.description:
Land

Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.

When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Gray Merchant of Asphodel
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

item.title: [scd] Gravitational Shift
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures with flying get +2/+0.

Creatures without flying get -2/-0.

item.title: [scd] Gravespawn Sovereign
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [scd] Gleaming Overseer
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

item.title: [scd] Gideon Jura
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Gideon

+2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.

−2: Destroy target tapped creature.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

item.title: [scd] Geralf's Mindcrusher
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player mills five cards.

Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [scd] Geode Rager
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

First strike

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [scd] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [scd] Garruk's Uprising
item.description:
Enchantment

When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)

Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Game Trail
item.description:
Land

As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [scd] Furnace Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Frontier Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.

• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

item.title: [scd] Fortified Village
item.description:
Land

As Fortified Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Fortified Village enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)
